message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_TIME_WORKED_CHANGED
message.locale:
Time worked changed on %1z %2s by %3s. 
Changed From: %4s. 
Changed To: %5s. 
%6s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_CREATED
message.locale: Task created on %1z %2s by %3s. \n%4s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_UNRESERVED
message.locale: Task made available on %1z %2s by %3s. \nMade Available From: %4s. \n%5s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_COMMENT
message.locale: Comment added on %1z %2s by %3s. \n%4s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_RESERVED_WITH_RESERVEDTO
message.locale:
Task added to My Tasks list on %1z %2s by %3s. 
Taken from the My Tasks list of: %4s. 
Added to the My Tasks list of: %5s. 
%6s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_RESERVED_WITHOUT_RESERVEDTO
message.locale: Task added to the My Tasks list on %1z %2s by %3s. \nTaken from the My Tasks list of: %4s. \n%5s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_RESERVED_WITHOUT_RESERVEDFROM
message.locale: Task added to the My Tasks list on %1z %2s by %3s. \nAdded to the My Tasks list of: %4s. \n%5s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_FORWARDED
message.locale:
Task forwarded on %1z %2s by %3s. 
Forwarded From: %4s. 
Forwarded To: %5s. 
%6s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_REALLOCATED
message.locale: Task reallocated on %1z %2s by %3s. \nReallocated From: %4s. \n%5s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_DEFERRED
message.locale: Task deferred on %1z %2s by %3s. \nDeferred Until: %4s. \n%5s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_DEFERRED_WITH_DATE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Task deferred on %1z %2s by %3s. \nDeferred Until: %4d. \n%5s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_DEFERRED_WITH_NO_DATE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Task deferred on %1z %2s by %3s. \nDeferred Until: No Date Specified. \n%4s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_RESTARTED
message.locale: Task restarted on %1z %2s by %3s. \n%4s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_ALLOCATED_USING_FAILURE_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY
message.locale: Task allocated using the failure allocation strategy named %1s.

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_ALLOCATED_TO_DEFAULT_WORK_QUEUE
message.locale: Task assigned to the default work queue named %1s.

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_CLOSED
message.locale: Task closed on %1z %2s by %3s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_DEADLINE_EXPIRED
message.locale: Task deadline expired on %1z %2s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_DEADLINE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Task deadline modified from %1s to %2s on %3z %4s by %5s. \n%6s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_DEADLINE_UPDATED
message.locale: Task deadline modified from %1z to %2z on %3z %4s by %5s. \n%6s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_PRIORITY_MODIFIED
message.locale: Task priority modified from %1s to %2s on %3z %4s by %5s. \n%6s

message.name: INF_TASK_AUTOMATICALLY_ADD_TO_USER_TASKS
message.locale: Task automatically added to the task list of User %1s on %2z %3s by %4s

message.name: INF_TASK_HISTORY_HEADER
message.locale: \n
